channel.title: Iron and Wine on Paul Cutler

item.title: Round-Up
item.description: Some links to get you through your day: Florence + The Machine’s second album should be complete by the end of July and offer a “heavier sound”. (Florence + The Machine play the Minnesota Zoo a week from tomorrow. Pitchfork reviews Arctic Monkey’s new album Suck it and See, giving it a 7.5. One of the most buzzed about releases of the year, Bon Iver’s self-titled album Bon Iver, is now streaming and comes out June 21st.
